content: skill level intermediate level 3 vanna s choice® article #860 2 colors 8 balls total a 5 balls b 3 balls crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm afghan body is worked in half_double_crochet u s with intarsia design in contrast color chart provided for 106 row use separate ball of yarn for each large block of color crochet edging to finish available in different colorways 70355ad intarsia brocade afghan 1 2005 *pea green linen* 70551ad intarsia brocade afghan 2 2005 *rust linen* also available on joann com p370773 intarsia crochet brocade throw 3 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70355ad html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70551ad html
